io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.api.to

Class SearchCriteriaTo

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.transferobject.api.AbstractTransferObject
      • net.sf.mmm.util.search.base.AbstractSearchCriteria
        • io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.api.to.SearchCriteriaTo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.Entity, net.sf.mmm.util.search.api.SearchCriteria, net.sf.mmm.util.transferobject.api.TransferObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrderPositionSearchCriteriaTo, OrderSearchCriteriaTo

    public abstract class SearchCriteriaTo
extends net.sf.mmm.util.search.base.AbstractSearchCriteria
    This is the interface for a transfer-object with the criteria for a search query. Such object specifies the criteria selecting which hits will match when performing a search.
    NOTE:
    This interface only holds generic settings for the query such as AbstractSearchCriteria.getHitOffset(), AbstractSearchCriteria.getMaximumHitCount(), and AbstractSearchCriteria.getSearchTimeout(). For your individual search, you extend SearchCriteriaTo to create a java bean with all the fields for your search.
    Author:
    hohwille
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • limitMaximumHitCount

        public void limitMaximumHitCount(int limit)
        Limits the maximum hit count by the given limit. If current maximum hit count is null or greater than the given limit, the value is replaced by limit.
        Overrides:
        limitMaximumHitCount in class net.sf.mmm.util.search.base.AbstractSearchCriteria
        Parameters:
        limit - is the maximum allowed value for maximum hit count.
